namdtools.io.read_log¶

namdtools.io.read_log(fname, glob=None, usecols=None)[source]¶

Read output from NAMD.

Parameters:

  • fname (str) – Name of NAMD output file.

  • glob (bool or dict) – Does fname need to be globbed? If a boolean, uses glob. If dictionary, uses vglob. (Default: None)

  • usecols (list-like or callable) – (Optional) Specify columns to return.

Return type:

Log
